actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-22.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Agriculture.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-22) Authorizes expenditures, not to exceed $1,025,000, by the House Committee on Agriculture for investigations and studies. Prohibits any part of these funds from being available for expenditure in connection with the study of any subject which is being investigated for the same purpose by any other House committee. Terminates the funds authorized by this resolution on January 3, 1980.

titles.title: A resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Agriculture.
